244378.「止まれ！\n このような場に なんの用だ。: Stop! What do you want with a place like this?

244379.<cs_pchero>は ミルフィからのメッセージを\nルベンという人物に 届け:
<cs_pchero> informed him that he had come to
deliver a message from Millefi to someone
named Reuben.

244380.「ミルフィからか……私が ルベンだ。\n よし 話を聞こう。こちらに来てくれ。:
It's Milfi...I'm Reuben. All right, let's hear
what he has to say. Come with me.

244381.「フフフ。身動きは おろか 声も出せないだろ。\n さっそくだが キミの相棒は:
Huh. You can't move, let alone make a sound.
Now, where's your partner? Nelim, if I may...

244382.「おや？ 事態を のみ込めていない？: Hmm? You don't understand what's going on?

244383.<pipipi_high>「おお！ どうか 愛しのルベンに\n 私の死を 伝えて:
<pipipi_high>Oh! Please tell my beloved Reuben
of my death...kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk
kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk.

244384.「あの依頼人のミルフィは 私だよ。\n シロートにしては 迫真の演技だったろ？:
That client Milfie is me. That was a very
convincing performance for Sirot, wasn't it?

244385.「最初に名乗った ルベンというのも 偽名でね。\n 本当の名は ギスマイヤーとい:
My first name, Reuben, was also a pseudonym.
His real name is Gismeyer. I was very careful.

244386.「さてと……用があるのは ネリム君のほうでね。\n 一緒だと 思い込んでいたが…:
Well... it's Nelim who wants to see you. I
assumed you'd be with me, but... well, if
you're not here, I'll just use you as bait.

244388.「えへへ～ 気になって 追ってきちゃった。\n ルベンさんて この人かな？:
Hehehe~ I got curious and followed you. Is
this the person you are referring to, Mr.
Reuben?

244389.「そうだよ。キミが ネリム君だね。\n じつに いいタイミングだ。\n キミに:
That's right. You must be Nelim. Very good
timing. I have a favor to ask you.

244390.「この本はね 死霊の書と呼ばれる\n 特別な書物だ。しかも 由緒ある血筋の者……:
This book is a special book called the Book of Dead. Moreover, it can only be opened by those of a venerable lineage...those who have
inherited the book.

244391.「かねてから 継承者を見つけだそうと\n デスマスターが 近寄りそうな場所に\n:
For some time now, I've been steadily applying the art of detection to places where death masters might approach in an attempt to locate
the heir...

244392.「それで つい先日 発見に至ったのだが\n 継承者のキミが デスマスターでなかっ:
So, it wasn't long ago that we made the discovery that you, the heir apparent, were not the death master! No wonder we couldn't
find you for so long!

244393.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。なんか ヤバそうだし\n 用がすんでるなら 早い:
Hey, <cs_pchero>. It looks like something's
wrong, so if you've done what you have to do,
let's get out of here.

244394.<if_woman>「おっと <cs_pchero>君が 帰れるかどうかは\n:
<if_woman>Oh, and whether or not <cs_pchero> can
return is up to you. Unseal the Book of Dead.
Then I will set her free.<else>Oh, and whether or not <cs_pchero> can
return is up to you. Unseal the Book of Dead.
Then I will set him free.<endif>

244395.「はぁ？ なに言ってくれてんの アンタ。\n アタシを おどしてんの？:
Huh? What are you talking about? Are you
scaring me?

244396.「まあまあ。そう 怖いカオ しなさんなって。\n カンタンなことさ。ただ この本:
Oh, well. Don't be so scared, my dear. It's
easy. All you have to do is open this book.

244397.「封印してあるってことはさ……コレ\n かなり ヤバイ本なんじゃないの？\n 協:
If the book is sealed, doesn't that mean it's
a very bad book? There's no way I can
cooperate.

244399.「あー もうッ！ わかったよ。\n アタシが こいつを ひらくと同時に\n アン:
Oh, God! I get it. As soon as I open this, you
should release your <cs_pchero> too!

244400.「おお！ やった！ やったぞ！！\n 何人たりとも ひらけなかった 死霊の書が\:
Oh! We did it! We did it! The Book of Dead,
which no one had ever been able to open,
finally opened.

244401.「残念だよ ネリム君。死霊の書は\n ひらこうとする者の命を 奪うというが\n:
I am sorry, Mr. Nelim. They say that the Book of Dead will take the life of anyone who tries to open it, but I'm surprised that it would
stop even the heir to the throne.

244402.「だがね 私の好みで言えば 生きてるキミより\n 死んでるキミのほうが 断然 美:
But you know, for my taste, you are much more
beautiful dead than alive.

244403.「ゾクゾクするよ！ 狂おしいほどにッ！: It's tingling! It's driving me crazy!

244404.「ひとつの死体だけでも こんなにも\n 美しいのだから 何百何千という死体に\n:
One corpse alone is so beautiful, if it were
surrounded by hundreds or thousands of
corpses....

244405.「現実味のない話に 聞こえるかな……。\n この 死霊の書さえあれば 死者の王国:
I don't mean to sound unrealistic, but with
this Book of Dead, it's quite possible to
build a kingdom of the dead.

244406.「うたがっているのかい？\n なら ひとつ 実演してみせよう。:
Are you singing? Then let me give you a
demonstration.

244407.「現世にうごめく 怨霊よ！ 亡者の魂よ！\n この地に埋もれた 死肉に宿り\n:
O grudge that haunts this world! Souls of the
departed! Dwell in the dead flesh buried here,
and rise once more as spirits of the dead!

244408.「<cs_pchero>君 しばしの別れだ。\n 次に会うときは キミを死霊とし:
<cs_pchero> This is a short farewell. Next
time we meet, I will summon you as Summon
Dead.

244409.<cs_pchero>は ネリムの なきがらを抱えて\nデズリンの待つ家に 戻っ:
<cs_pchero> returned to Deathlin's house
with the unctuous remains of Nelim...

244410.「どうしたの <cs_pchero>さん！？\n ネリムちゃんは……ま まさか…:
What's wrong <cs_pchero>! Nelim is... no
way...

244411.「ああ……わたくしが この子を\n 行かせてしまった ばっかりに……: Oh... it's my fault for letting her go...

244412.「<cs_pchero>さん 何があったか\n 話してくださいますね？:
<cs_pchero> You will tell us what happened,
won't you?

244413.「い…依頼者が ギスマイヤーだったなんて……\n あの者は 死霊の書の 封印を解:
I can't believe that the request form was
Gismeyer...the one who was trying to find the
heir to unlock the seal of the Book of Dead.

244414.「怨霊を 死肉に宿らせる 禁忌の書。\n 記したのは ネリムちゃんの遠い祖先です:
It is a forbidden book that makes the grudge dwell in the flesh of the dead. It was written by a distant ancestor of Nelim. Therefore,
this child is the heir to the book.

244415.「書は 代々 継承されていったのですが\n どこかの時点で 盗難にあい……\n:
The book was passed down from generation to
generation, but at some point it was stolen...
and passed around the world to Gismeyer.

244416.「わたくしの家系は 継承者を守りつつ\n 紛失した書を探す役目を になっていまし:
My family was tasked with finding the lost
book while protecting its heirs.

244417.「しかし 一族は衰え わたくしの先々代で\n すでに 継承者の家系は デスマスタ:
However, the family was in decline, and the line of heirs had already passed from the position of death master in my previous
generation.

244418.「かわいそうな ネリムちゃん……この子は\n 偉大なる祖先のことも 死霊の書のこ:
Poor little Nelim...this child was murdered
without knowing a single thing about his great
ancestors or the Book of Dead.

244421.「……ひとつ 腑に落ちなかったのは\n 継承者であるはずのネリムちゃんが 死霊の:
One thing that didn't make sense to me was the fact that Nelim, who was supposed to be the heir, fell down after opening the Book of
Dead.

244422.「著者は 悪用を恐れ 継承者以外の者が\n 書を ひらこうとすれば 絶命する呪法:
It is said that the author was so afraid of misuse that he had a spell placed on the book that would kill anyone who tried to crack it
except for his heirs.

244423.「ネリムちゃんは 継承者ではあるけれど\n デスマスターではない。この 中途半端:
Nelim is an heir but not a death master. This
half-assed state may have been the cause of
her falling into a coma...

244424.「いったん わたくしのほうで ネリムちゃんを\n 覚醒させる手段を 探してみます: I will try to find a way to awaken Nelim.

244425.「それと……こちらは 危険な事態に\n 巻き込んでしまったことへの お詫びを込め:
Also... this is my way of apologizing for
putting you in harm's way. Please accept it.

244426.「ネリムちゃんを救う方法が 見つかったら\n そのときは ぜひ 協力してください:
If you find a way to save Nelim, please help
us then.
